sourcesContent:
import { useState, useContext } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import ItemCount from "../ItemCount/ItemCount" import { Context } from "../../App" const ItemDetail = ({ id, img, name, stock, precio, descripcion, category}) => { const [cantidad, setCantidad] = useState(0) const onAdd = (cantidad) => { setCantidad(cantidad) } return(

Detalle

{name}

Precio: ${precio}

Descripcion: {descripcion}

Categoria: {category}

Stock: {stock}

{cantidad > 0 ? : }
) } export default ItemDetail
